description.@en: Sometimes, the old ways are best. The Apothecaryâ€™s understanding of natural medicines and country remedies produces pure, undiluted concoctions that yield impressive results. You are trusted by wives and husbands as being a medical Doktor in your own right. But a canny chirurgeon may see through any deceptions should you try to ply quackery or fraudulent medicinal potions.

effect.@en: You may flip the results to succeed at Alchemy Tests. When you succeed, it is always considered a Critical Success. In addition, you never suffer Peril as a result of failed or Critically Failed Alchemy Tests.
